definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: It is a region inhabited by an overwhelming majority of the Korean minority nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 長白山區，是我國朝鮮族同胞的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: Western Guizhou is inhabited by many minority nationalities living in compact communities.
sentences.chinese: 黔西是一個少數民族聚居地。

sentences.english: Shangqiu is the original settlement of the Shang Tribe.
sentences.chinese: 商丘是商族的起源和聚居地。

sentences.english: The Mai Po Marshes form one of the most important wildlife conservation sites in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 米埔沼澤區是本港野生動物的主要聚居地之一。

sentences.english: New York is a vast melting-pot of different nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 紐約是不同國籍的人的聚居地。

sentences.english: Seventeen thousand Indians live in Arizona on a reservation .
sentences.chinese: 一萬七千名印第安人居住在亞利桑那州的聚居地。

sentences.english: This morning a great disturbance invaded the peaceful gypsy settlement.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上這個寧靜的吉普賽聚居地受到了巨大的驚擾。

sentences.english: The city is the mainly melting-pot for mankind, meanwhile, it is the pole pit of economic growth in region.
sentences.chinese: 城市是人類的主要聚居地，也是區域經濟增長的極核。

sentences.english: The south of Jiangxi province is the main habitation of Hakkas.
sentences.chinese: 贛南是客家人的主要聚居地。

sentences.english: Assam is the home of the largest concentration Asiatic elephants in the world.
sentences.chinese: 阿薩姆邦是世界上最大的亞洲象聚居地。

sentences.english: Mai Po Marshes form one of the most important wildlife conservation sites in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 米埔沼澤區是本港野生動物的主要聚居地之一。

sentences.english: Last spring, Shadle headed to Tampa Bay to photograph a spoonbill rookery there.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天，夏德去坦帕灣拍攝琵鷺聚居地。

definition: to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
cohabitation (of different populations or races)/to coexist
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
